abstract.t: This document considers issues of downgrading from X.400 (1988) to X.400 (1984),. Annexe B of X.419 specifies some downgrading rules, but these are not sufficient for provision of service in an environment containing both 1984 and 1988 components. This document defines a number of extensions to this annexe.
This specification is not tutorial. COSINE Study 8.2 by J.A.I. Craigie gives a useful overview.
